title: Bean and Barley Stew
ingredients: ['200g uncooked pearl barley', '700ml water', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '160g chopped onion', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary', '75g small fresh mushrooms', '150g chopped yellow pepper', '2 tablespoons white wine', '1 (410g) tin cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes, drained', '60g fresh spinach', '1 pinch crushed chillies']
